body: Day 13 - Manga 318* I'm sorry guys but I'm gonna take a break. Each day that passes makes me feel worse and worse about myself. I will stay out of these types of sites for at least two weeks to try and get my life under control. I'm really sorry but I can't continue like this. If I don't come back after these two weeks it's because I committed suicide. Hopefully see y'all when I'm better. You friend MinaYaku will stay with you. 4/10.
I don't understand what's going on but 6/10
If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga
